segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a slippery mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to see the water just pouring out like that, going to waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and it's just gross to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are focused on the cookies, not paying attention to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll slip on the wet floor and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just unpleasant, seeing the water go to waste like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up the mess soon before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a slow-motion disaster unfold, and it's just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR
